name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove COOP Header from Google Lens

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy response header occasionally breaks opening links to lens.google.com - this extension removes it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extensions fixes a Google Lens website issue where  instead of the image results an error "ERR_BLOCKED_BY_RESPONSE" is displayed.

Details:
When a link to Google Lens is placed on a website in the format of https://lens.google.com/uploadbyurl?url=IMAGE_URL in order to search for similar images on Google Lens, the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy HTTP response header from Google Lens occasionally 
causes lens.google.com not to display a page with image results.
Instead of regular Google Lens results page, an error is shown:
lens.google.com is blocked
ERR_BLOCKED_BY_RESPONSE

This extension removes that HTTP response header when visiting lens.google.com, thus preventing the error and showing the Google Lens results.
